entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -29.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
